content.question:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.

a) Describe changes in the pattern of immigration within and to Europe in the second half of the twentieth century.
b) Explain one significant cause of the changes in patterns of migration in Europe in the second half of the twentieth century.
c) Explain one effect of the changes in migration patterns on European politics in the late twentieth century.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
